typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(HashColumn = toBinary(md5(ReferrerDomain+UTMSource+UTMMedium+UTMCampaign+UTMContent)),
		CreatedOn = currentTimestamp(),
		UpdatedOn = currentTimestamp()) ~> HashCompute
HashCompute lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
